attributes.action: End Mass Immigration to the U.K.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I wish to stop mass immigration to the U.K.,which is over-populating this island, causing immense pressure on Housing, Health, transport, police and other public services. The unprecedented levels of immigration are undermining our culture & heritage and creating division and tension between ethnic/religious groups and causing distress to the indigenous population against the wishes of the vast majority of the indigenous population of the U.K. 
THERE HAS NEVER BEEN ANY CONSULTATION WITH THE BRITISH PUBLIC OR A REFERENDUM OVER THESE CHANGES AND ARE IN DANGER OF DESTROYING OUR CULTURE!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
